body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Alexander Systems. My name is Ralph Alexander. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Victoria. To assist you better, could you provide me your phone number and email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is seven eight six, five five five, four three two one. And my email address is vcoleman@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Victoria. One zero zero percent, we value your time and concerns related to Car Dealership data management.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that. I've been quite disappointed with the recent data handling. Is there a way to improve the process?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We understand your frustration, Victoria. Let's work together to address this issue. Our team will review and enhance the data management system to better meet your needs.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That sounds promising. I hope to see positive changes soon.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely. We aim to resolve your concerns and enhance your experience with our services. Thank you for your time today, Victoria.
